Description.Text: Location This ApartHotel is centrally located in Playa del Inglés, approximately 150 m from the beach promenade. The kilometre-long sandy beach is just 600 m away and a wide selection of shopping and entertainment venues lie 200 from the hotel, as do the Metro and Kasbah amusement centres. Public transport departs from a stop located directly in front of the hotel. Facilities A lobby and a reception are available to guests. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. The apartment hotel features various services and facilities for a comfortable and relaxing stay, including internet access, wireless internet access, a restaurant, a café, a bar and a TV room. Guests can visit the supermarket to purchase daily necessities. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A bicycle hire service (for a fee) gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms The apartment hotel offers non-smoking rooms. All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a fan, a living room and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is among the standard amenities included with most rooms. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms or a sofa-bed. A safe is also available. A kitchenette equipped with a fridge and a mini-fridge can be found in each accommodation unit. Each accommodation unit offers a telephone and a TV. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a hairdryer and tiles. Each accommodation unit includes a bathroom with tiles. Sports/Entertainment The apartment hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Guests can enjoy various leisure options during their free time, including table tennis, a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, tennis, a gym and pool/billiards. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for adults, an entertainment programme for children, live music and a kids' disco provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The apartment hotel offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner, half board and All-inclusive. The apartment hotel additionally offers snacks. Alcohol-free drinks and alcoholic drinks are available.
